com.escape.games.api
Interface RenderContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
RenderService, RenderServiceImpl
public interface RenderContext

Ability to manage scene-wide bookkeeping and shader setup.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Summary

Method Detail

activateShader

void activateShader(com.escape.games.resource.Shader sx)
Notify we are using this shader. If shader isn't changing, return immediately. Context calls Shader.teardown() on previously-active shader, if any. Context calls sx.setup() on now-current shader. Context sets the current shader for subsequent calls.

Parameters:
sx - Shader to activate and become current shader.

usingModel

void usingModel(float[] matrixM)
Notify we are using this model transform on current shader. Should call after activateShader() is successful. Context will set any matrix uniforms in effect.

Parameters:
matrixM - (M) matrix.

matrixV

float[] matrixV()
Get the current View (V) matrix.

Returns:
(V) matrix.

matrixVP

float[] matrixVP()
Get the current View/Projection (VP) matrix.

Returns:
(VP) matrix.
